thread.section_title: RC Willey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Willey | rcwilley.com | 8 of 150
thread.title: Stephanie

author: Stephanie
title: Stephanie
text: Ive had bad luck in the past with RC Willey and I said i would never use them again but their prices are outstanding compared to their competitors so I decided to give them another chance. I bought a new bed and requested a 30 minute window for delivery so I could come home on my lunch break. When I got home the truck arrived within 5 minutes so their estimate was on point. They quickly brought the bed upstairs and put it together. They were so friendly and polite to me and they quickly left and I got back to work right on time. I was very impressed with their prompt arrival and excellent customer service. I will use RC Willey again in the future.
